attributes.action: Abandon the e-petition system and get on with running the country for the good of the electorate.
attributes.additional_details: This government should stop wasting time pretending to care what people have to say with e-petitions and get on with running the country for the good of the electorate, not with an eye on their personal and political futures. Stand for something and be judged for that not the ability to be all things to all people.
